description: This undergraduate seminar is about how ethnographers do research. It introduces fundamental concepts and techniques - research design, participant observation, interviews, questionnaires, field notes, archives, data collection and analysis. It also addresses ethical and legal issues- cultural protocols, intellectual property rights, collaborative anthropology, and institutional review boards.
name: RESRCH MTHDS SOCL ANTH: Research Methods in Cultural Anthropology

section.name: RESRCH MTHDS SOCL ANTH: Research Methods in Cultural Anthropology
